preferences.name: ixxPath
preferences.title: Ixx Path
preferences.description: The path to the ixx file. This is the CLI of NüschtOS and is needed for this extension to work. Currently you need to build it yourself. https://github.com/NuschtOS/ixx. Build via `cargo build --release`, then point to the `target/release/ixx` binary.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
